                                         throws java.io.IOException

        Returns:
        An ArrayList consisting of Admin objects
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - Throws an exception to the method which called this method.

                            int index)
        A method to print all the Indexes/Classes
        Parameters:
        courseCode - courseCode of a particular course
        index - Index of a particular course.E.g, CE2003_1.Where 1 refers to the index
